arabic: حم
english: Ha-Mim. (Only Allah and the Messenger [blessings and peace be upon him] know the real meaning.)

arabic: وَالْكِتَابِ الْمُبِينِ
english: By this Light-Giving Book,

arabic: إِنَّا أَنزَلْنَاهُ فِي لَيْلَةٍ مُّبَارَكَةٍ ۚ إِنَّا كُنَّا مُنذِرِينَ
english: Surely, We have sent it down in a blessed night. Surely, We are the Warner.

arabic: فِيهَا يُفْرَقُ كُلُّ أَمْرٍ حَكِيمٍ
english: In this (night) judgment is given on all matters of wisdom (separately),

arabic: أَمْرًا مِّنْ عِندِنَا ۚ إِنَّا كُنَّا مُرْسِلِينَ
english: By Our command; surely, it is We Who send.

arabic: رَحْمَةً مِّن رَّبِّكَ ۚ إِنَّهُ هُوَ السَّمِيعُ الْعَلِيمُ
english: (It) is mercy from your Lord. Verily, He is All-Hearing, All-Knowing,

arabic: رَبِّ السَّمَاوَاتِ وَالْأَرْضِ وَمَا بَيْنَهُمَا ۖ إِن كُنتُم مُّوقِنِينَ
english: The Lord of the heavens and the earth and all that is between them, provided you have faith with certitude.

arabic: لَا إِلَـٰهَ إِلَّا هُوَ يُحْيِي وَيُمِيتُ ۖ رَبُّكُمْ وَرَبُّ آبَائِكُمُ الْأَوَّلِينَ
english: There is no God but He. He is the One Who gives life and causes death. He is your Lord and the Lord of your fathers (as well).

arabic: بَلْ هُمْ فِي شَكٍّ يَلْعَبُونَ
english: Yet they are in doubt, busy playing.

arabic: فَارْتَقِبْ يَوْمَ تَأْتِي السَّمَاءُ بِدُخَانٍ مُّبِينٍ
english: So wait for the Day when the sky will cause a clear smoke to appear,

arabic: يَغْشَى النَّاسَ ۖ هَـٰذَا عَذَابٌ أَلِيمٌ
english: Which will envelop people (i.e., will encompass everything). That will be a painful torment.

arabic: رَّبَّنَا اكْشِفْ عَنَّا الْعَذَابَ إِنَّا مُؤْمِنُونَ
english: (They will then say:) ‘O our Lord! Remove this torment from us. Surely, we believe.’

arabic: أَنَّىٰ لَهُمُ الذِّكْرَىٰ وَقَدْ جَاءَهُمْ رَسُولٌ مُّبِينٌ
english: How can their acceptance of the admonition now be (of any use), whereas there came to them a Messenger with a clear exposition?

arabic: ثُمَّ تَوَلَّوْا عَنْهُ وَقَالُوا مُعَلَّمٌ مَّجْنُونٌ
english: But they turned their faces from him and (denigrating) they said: ‘(He) is a tutored madman.’

arabic: إِنَّا كَاشِفُو الْعَذَابِ قَلِيلًا ۚ إِنَّكُمْ عَائِدُونَ
english: Indeed, We remove the torment a little (but) you will certainly reiterate (the same disbelief).

arabic: يَوْمَ نَبْطِشُ الْبَطْشَةَ الْكُبْرَىٰ إِنَّا مُنتَقِمُونَ
english: The Day when We will seize with the Greatest Seizure, (that Day) We shall certainly exact revenge.

arabic: ۞ وَلَقَدْ فَتَنَّا قَبْلَهُمْ قَوْمَ فِرْعَوْنَ وَجَاءَهُمْ رَسُولٌ كَرِيمٌ
english: And in fact, We put to trial the people of Pharaoh (also) before them and the exalted Messenger (Musa [Moses]) came to them.

arabic: أَنْ أَدُّوا إِلَيَّ عِبَادَ اللَّهِ ۖ إِنِّي لَكُمْ رَسُولٌ أَمِينٌ
english: (He said:) ‘Hand over to me the servants of Allah (the Children of Israel). Verily, I am a trusted Messenger for your guidance and leadership.

arabic: وَأَن لَّا تَعْلُوا عَلَى اللَّهِ ۖ إِنِّي آتِيكُم بِسُلْطَانٍ مُّبِينٍ
english: And do not rebel against Allah. I have come to you with the enlightening proof.

arabic: وَإِنِّي عُذْتُ بِرَبِّي وَرَبِّكُمْ أَن تَرْجُمُونِ
english: And I have indeed sought the protection of my Lord and your Lord lest you should stone me.

arabic: وَإِن لَّمْ تُؤْمِنُوا لِي فَاعْتَزِلُونِ
english: And if you do not believe in me, then keep away from me.’

arabic: فَدَعَا رَبَّهُ أَنَّ هَـٰؤُلَاءِ قَوْمٌ مُّجْرِمُونَ
english: Then he prayed to his Lord: ‘Surely, they are a sinful people.’

arabic: فَأَسْرِ بِعِبَادِي لَيْلًا إِنَّكُم مُّتَّبَعُونَ
english: (Allah said:) ‘Then set out with My servants by night. You shall certainly be chased.

arabic: وَاتْرُكِ الْبَحْرَ رَهْوًا ۖ إِنَّهُمْ جُندٌ مُّغْرَقُونَ
english: And (after you pass through) leave the river still and split open. Surely, they are an army who will be drowned.’

arabic: كَمْ تَرَكُوا مِن جَنَّاتٍ وَعُيُونٍ
english: How many a garden and spring they left behind!

arabic: وَزُرُوعٍ وَمَقَامٍ كَرِيمٍ
english: And green crops and magnificent buildings!

arabic: وَنَعْمَةٍ كَانُوا فِيهَا فَاكِهِينَ
english: And blessings (and comforts) in which they used to luxuriate!

arabic: كَذَٰلِكَ ۖ وَأَوْرَثْنَاهَا قَوْمًا آخَرِينَ
english: So it happened! We made another people the inheritors of all that.

arabic: فَمَا بَكَتْ عَلَيْهِمُ السَّمَاءُ وَالْأَرْضُ وَمَا كَانُوا مُنظَرِينَ
english: Then neither the heaven nor the earth wept over them, nor were they given respite.

arabic: وَلَقَدْ نَجَّيْنَا بَنِي إِسْرَائِيلَ مِنَ الْعَذَابِ الْمُهِينِ
english: And verily, We delivered the Children of Israel from a humiliating suffering,

arabic: مِن فِرْعَوْنَ ۚ إِنَّهُ كَانَ عَالِيًا مِّنَ الْمُسْرِفِينَ
english: From Pharaoh. Indeed, he was of the most rebellious transgressors.

arabic: وَلَقَدِ اخْتَرْنَاهُمْ عَلَىٰ عِلْمٍ عَلَى الْعَالَمِينَ
english: And surely, We chose them (the Children of Israel) above (their contemporary civilizations of) the world on the basis of knowledge.

arabic: وَآتَيْنَاهُم مِّنَ الْآيَاتِ مَا فِيهِ بَلَاءٌ مُّبِينٌ
english: And We bestowed upon them signs containing an obvious favour (and a clear trial).

arabic: إِنَّ هَـٰؤُلَاءِ لَيَقُولُونَ
english: Surely, they say:

arabic: إِنْ هِيَ إِلَّا مَوْتَتُنَا الْأُولَىٰ وَمَا نَحْنُ بِمُنشَرِينَ
english: ‘There is nothing after our first death and we shall not be raised up (again).

arabic: فَأْتُوا بِآبَائِنَا إِن كُنتُمْ صَادِقِينَ
english: So bring back our ancestors (alive) if you are truthful.’

arabic: أَهُمْ خَيْرٌ أَمْ قَوْمُ تُبَّعٍ وَالَّذِينَ مِن قَبْلِهِمْ ۚ أَهْلَكْنَاهُمْ ۖ إِنَّهُمْ كَانُوا مُجْرِمِينَ
english: Well, are they better or the people of Tubba‘ (the people of As‘ad Abu Kurib al-Himyari, the King of Yemen) and those who were before them? We destroyed (all of) them. Surely, they were people given to evildoing.

arabic: وَمَا خَلَقْنَا السَّمَاوَاتِ وَالْأَرْضَ وَمَا بَيْنَهُمَا لَاعِبِينَ
english: And We have not created the heavens and the earth and all that is between them merely in sport.

arabic: مَا خَلَقْنَاهُمَا إِلَّا بِالْحَقِّ وَلَـٰكِنَّ أَكْثَرَهُمْ لَا يَعْلَمُونَ
english: We have created them both with (the purpose and reason) of truth. But most of them do not know.

arabic: إِنَّ يَوْمَ الْفَصْلِ مِيقَاتُهُمْ أَجْمَعِينَ
english: Surely, the Day of Judgment is the appointed time for all of them;

arabic: يَوْمَ لَا يُغْنِي مَوْلًى عَن مَّوْلًى شَيْئًا وَلَا هُمْ يُنصَرُونَ
english: The Day when a friend shall not avail a friend at all, nor will they be helped,

arabic: إِلَّا مَن رَّحِمَ اللَّهُ ۚ إِنَّهُ هُوَ الْعَزِيزُ الرَّحِيمُ
english: Except those to whom Allah has shown mercy. (They will intercede for one another.) Surely, He is Almighty, Ever-Merciful.

arabic: إِنَّ شَجَرَتَ الزَّقُّومِ
english: Indeed, the tree bearing thorny fruit,

arabic: طَعَامُ الْأَثِيمِ
english: Will be the food of the major sinners.

arabic: كَالْمُهْلِ يَغْلِي فِي الْبُطُونِ
english: It will boil in the bellies like molten copper,

arabic: كَغَلْيِ الْحَمِيمِ
english: Like the seething of simmering water.

arabic: خُذُوهُ فَاعْتِلُوهُ إِلَىٰ سَوَاءِ الْجَحِيمِ
english: (It will be commanded:) ‘Seize him and drag him forcefully to the midst of Hell,

arabic: ثُمَّ صُبُّوا فَوْقَ رَأْسِهِ مِنْ عَذَابِ الْحَمِيمِ
english: Then torment him by pouring boiling water over his head.

arabic: ذُقْ إِنَّكَ أَنتَ الْعَزِيزُ الْكَرِيمُ
english: Taste it! Yes, you it is, the respectable and venerable (in your notion and claim).

arabic: إِنَّ هَـٰذَا مَا كُنتُم بِهِ تَمْتَرُونَ
english: Certainly, this is the very Hell you used to doubt.’

arabic: إِنَّ الْمُتَّقِينَ فِي مَقَامٍ أَمِينٍ
english: Assuredly, the Godfearing will be in a place of calm and peace,

arabic: فِي جَنَّاتٍ وَعُيُونٍ
english: Amid gardens and springs,

arabic: يَلْبَسُونَ مِن سُندُسٍ وَإِسْتَبْرَقٍ مُّتَقَابِلِينَ
english: Dressed in fine silk and heavy brocade, facing one another.

arabic: كَذَٰلِكَ وَزَوَّجْنَاهُم بِحُورٍ عِينٍ
english: So will it happen! And We shall marry them to fair maidens having lovely wide eyes.

arabic: يَدْعُونَ فِيهَا بِكُلِّ فَاكِهَةٍ آمِنِينَ
english: (Sitting) there, they will call calmly for every kind of fruit.

arabic: لَا يَذُوقُونَ فِيهَا الْمَوْتَ إِلَّا الْمَوْتَةَ الْأُولَىٰ ۖ وَوَقَاهُمْ عَذَابَ الْجَحِيمِ
english: There (in Paradise) they will not taste death except the first death (which would have passed). And Allah will save them from the torment of Hell.

arabic: فَضْلًا مِّن رَّبِّكَ ۚ ذَٰلِكَ هُوَ الْفَوْزُ الْعَظِيمُ
english: It is a bounty of your Lord (i.e., your Lord will bestow through your mediation alone). That is but a great success.

arabic: فَإِنَّمَا يَسَّرْنَاهُ بِلِسَانِكَ لَعَلَّهُمْ يَتَذَكَّرُونَ
english: So We have made this (Qur’an) easy in your own tongue so that they may take advice.

arabic: فَارْتَقِبْ إِنَّهُم مُّرْتَقِبُونَ
english: So wait. Certainly, they (too) are waiting. (You will see Our revenge and their evil end, and they will see your glory and My favours to the believers through your mediation.)
